summary: This module adds support for a global Mølmer–Sørensen entangling operation, defining a multi‑qubit gate and its inverse that can be inserted into Qiskit circuits and automatically decomposed into standard two‑qubit RXX interactions.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to model and simulate trapped‑ion quantum hardware by providing a ready‑to‑use global entangling gate, facilitating algorithm design and hardware‑aware circuit compilation.
